comments.body: Main change on the client to let the producers know about new `ReceiveConnect` so that they can republish.
I was accidentally stashing a lost connection while being in a disconnected state. No need - and indeed it can then lead to a valid connection being cancelled.

comments.body: I was accidentally resetting the timer when I was stashing. We now ensure that the timer is set only if it has not been already.

The stash is now common to all of the states here.

comments.body: I'm unsure why this was previously constrained in terms of what messages should be stashed. We could have easily dropped some accidentally.
We now handle a connection being lost within the client side. This had been forgotten.

comments.body:
Empty lines aren't that expensive, please add a few.
(Possibly putting some Scaladoc on the super-class to keep the grouping you tried to achieve.)
I think that this is a coding style thing, and perhaps a little subjective. I won't mind at all if you'd like to do this once my PR is merged.
